::KitKat::

She felt a great wave a relief wash over her. She looke at Megatron 
and smiled a warm smile. "May our paths lead where they may. Thank 
you Megatron. Thank you Aracnia. We shall seal the pack and become 
the new council on earth." She smiled and looked up at Megatron. "We 
can attack as soon as you and Aracnia have your troops in order, we 
can all leave crush the Allience, then the maximals." She grinned a 
bit. "Megatron, when you are ready come to my base and we will leave 
from there. I thank you again." she smiled and bowed to Megatron.  
Then she turned to Aracnia. "Bring your troops to my base and we will 
attack at once." She bowed to Aracnia. "I thank you both for joining 
me on this great day."

She turned and started to leave and head back to her base.  She 
turned off her commlink and smiled. She was very pleased with what 
had happened.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron had to decide.....ally with the Allience, one of the 
most 
> influencial and power factions, or remain with the Predacons and 
help them 
> become the ultimate power on this planet. He looked up to the sky, 
as if it 
> held the answer....
>     "Kitkat, I belive I have just made a descicion that will change 
my life, 
> how ever long it may be....." He trailed off, without saying his 
little catch 
> phrase. "So be it, the Predacons will rule this planet. The 
Allience shall 
> fall before us, just as the Maximals will be crushed under the heel 
of our 
> boot. The Iron fist of Predacon rule has been long missed. It is 
time for us 
> to take hold of this planet...once and for all. Yes....." 
>     Megatron now smiled. As did Aracnia. Three forces, together at 
last, that 
> will see the downfall of two empires, and several pathetic factions 
that 
> should have been weeded out long ago.
>     "Now that things are settled, when shall we take on the 
Allience? my 
> troops can be ready and mobil in less than an hour. "Aracnia said, 
letting 
> her claw slide across her womb, filled with another bos spark.
